mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{CD_VOC_CAUSE}) = 2 THEN CAUSE1.CODE_NAME ELSE CAUSE1.CODE_NAME || ' > ' || CAUSE2.CODE_NAME END NM_VOC_CAUSE FROM (SELECT #{CD_VOC_CAUSE} AS PARAM_CAUSE FROM DUAL ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE CAUSE1 ON CAUSE1.CODE = SUBSTR(A.PARAM_CAUSE,0,2) AND CAUSE1.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_VOC_CAUSE_1' LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE CAUSE2 ON CAUSE2.CODE = A.PARAM_CAUSE AND CAUSE2.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_VOC_CAUSE_2'

SELECT TVM.ID_VOC , TVM.CD_VOC_CAUSE , TVM.NM_CUST , TVM.NO_PHONE , TVM.DS_EMAIL , TO_CHAR(TVM.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT_REG , TVM.ID_STORE , TVM.DS_TITLE , TVM.DS_CONT , NVL(MST.STOR_NM, '선택안됨') AS NM_STORE , DECODE(TVM.YN_PRIVACY_AGREE, 'Y', 'O', 'X') AS YN_PRIVACY_AGREE , DECODE(TVM.YN_SENSITIVE_AGREE, 'Y', 'O', 'X') AS YN_SENSITIVE_AGREE , DECODE(TVM.YN_PRIVACY_ORDER_AGREE, 'Y', 'O', 'X') AS YN_PRIVACY_ORDER_AGREE , DECODE(TVM.YN_SENSITIVE_ORDER_AGREE, 'Y', 'O', 'X') AS YN_SENSITIVE_ORDER_AGREE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_VOC_MASTER TVM LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_STOR_APP MST ON MST.STOR_CD = TVM.ID_STORE AND MST.CMP_CD = 'BKR' AND MST.SALES_ORG_CD = '1000' AND MST.STOR_STATUS = '1' AND SUBSTR(MST.STOR_CD, 4, 1) != 9 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') >= MST.SALES_START_DATE WHERE ID_VOC = #{ID_VOC}
SELECT ID_VOC , FILE_KEY , FILE_NM FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_VOC_ATTACH WHERE ID_VOC = #{ID_VOC}
mapper.delete: UPDATE CRMADMIN.TBS_VOC_MASTER SET FG_DEL = 'Y' , DT_UPT = SYSDATE WHERE ID_VOC = #{ID_VOC}
